document_data.name: Valken Naspeer
document_data.mainbody:
'''Valken Naspeer''' was the [[half-elf]] bodyguard of the [[Zhentarim|Black Network]] recruiter [[Urlam Stockspool]]   some time after the [[War of the Silver Marches]] of [[1485 DR]]. The two operated out of the [[Triboar Travelers]] caravan company located in the [[Triboar|town after which it was named]].

Valken was a charming and sophisticated individual.
